name: delivery_module
description: Logos Delivery Module - High-level message-delivery API

methods.name: createNode
methods.description: Initialize the delivery node with configuration

parameters.name: cfg
parameters.description: JSON configuration string for the delivery node

methods.name: send
methods.description: Send a message through the delivery network

parameters.name: contentTopic
parameters.description: The content topic for the message

methods.name: subscribe
methods.description: Subscribe to a content topic to receive messages

parameters.name: contentTopic
parameters.description: The content topic to subscribe to

parameters.name: contentTopic
parameters.description: The content topic to unsubscribe from

events.name: deliveryInitialized
events.description: Emitted when the delivery node is initialized

events.name: deliveryStarted
events.description: Emitted when the delivery node is started

events.name: messageSent
events.description: Emitted when a message is successfully sent

events.name: messageReceived
events.description: Emitted when a message is received

events.name: messageError
events.description: Emitted when an error occurs with message sending
